entities.name: goblet of fire
entities.description: The Goblet of Fire is a magical object that stands on a table in the Great Hall. It is tiny and has to be stood on a chair to see it properly.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is explaining the rules of the tournament to the champions.

entities.name: mr crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is a person who has examined the instructions for the tasks with Mr. Bagman.

entities.name: mr bagman
entities.description: Mr. Bagman is a person who has examined the instructions for the tasks with Mr. Crouch.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is a person who places the Goblet of Fire on the table before Dumbledore.

entities.name: ches t
entities.description: The ches t is an object that Filch places carefully on the table before Dumbledore.

entities.name: tasks
entities.description: There will be three tasks in the tournament, spaced throughout the school year.

entities.name: challenge
entities.description: The champions will face a challenge in each of the three tasks.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is standing next to the Goblet of Fire, which has been placed on a table in the Great Hall.
Mr. Crouch and Mr. Bagman have examined the instructions for the tasks.
Dumbledore is addressing the champions, explaining the rules of the tournament.
Filch has placed the Goblet of Fire on the table before Dumbledore.
The champions will face three tasks in the tournament.
